name: Downfall (itch) (Sonti560)
description:
This game was supposed to have reverb but WebGL doesn't support that. If you want better sounds you have to download the game.

You are security guard at an underground bank. You're late to work, so instead of taking the stairs you decide to take the lift to arrive at your workplace. However this lift has different plans for you... It takes you to the deepest possible floor. And you will not be alone. There are enemies at every corner. At least you have your gun which can distract them.
